subject: Re: Website Updates & Enhancements for Ezy Cleans & Ezy Move

full_threads.body:
Hey @joel and @heath - I met with him on the call (15 minutes).

We walked through these sheet.
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MkmLRtoJYDVD-pEDMBTpLpfwYmGxlc4UNtR1fi2HTo4/edit?gid=0#gid=0

I put a new estimate column in there to ensure he knows how big the asks here.

Please do not complete any more work on this till we get his sign off on additional budget as it will likely be 5 - 10 hours more work.

Fathom recording here - https://fathom.video/share/8qnidJCx-5Z2BywoYN8SDgLyGxQ-A-zZ

Hi Adrian,

Thank you for your patience.

We have listed all the items and responded next to it.
Here is the google sheet link. There are 2 tabs, Ezymove, Ezycleans

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MkmLRtoJYDVD-pEDMBTpLpfwYmGxlc4UNtR1fi2HTo4/edit?gid=0#gid=0

Let me know if this works for you?
@joel The client has asked for an update on this one. Can you please action when possible. Cheers.

full_threads.body: Just a friendly reminder that this ticket has been open for over 5 days. Please close it if it's resolved or follow up if necessary. Thanks!

Hi Adrian,

I hope all is well.

We will review this request and update you asap.

Just a small minor change to the pricing;

Remove "special deal"
Add for two men and a truck
Then hourly rate below

Cheers
Get Outlook for iOS

Hi All,
I would like the following added aswell into the works.

On the deposit payment screen, let the customer know that the $250 deposit will be deducted from their final invoice, which is due upon completion of their move. By securing the deposit, they agree to the service details and pricing.

i want to also follow up with customers on direct debiting. How does this work and can we implement this?

After a customer has made a deposit payment via online booking, send them a booking confirmation email and text, and ensure the booking is integrated into the CRM calendar.

Regards,
Adrian

Get Outlook for iOS

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow
Workflows ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow

full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,


Hope you're doing well. I've put together a list of updates and enhancements I'd like to implement for both Ezy Cleans and Ezy Move websites. Please review the list below and let me know the feasibility, timeline, and any additional details or options I should consider.


Additionally, I've compiled website ideas from other companies that I'd like to incorporate into these updates. You can find them here on Dropbox:

Website Ideas Reference.


Ezy Cleans

• Live Chat: Add a pop-up "Talk to a Human" message connected to a mobile number.

• My Account Button: Provide more details and options-currently in test mode.

• Real Reviews: Replace test reviews with real ones.

• Logo Update: Change the top-left home page logo to the black and blue version (not white).

• Cross-Promotion with Ezy Move: Advertise a 10% discount package for customers booking both moving and cleaning services.

• Detailed Cleaning Service Info: Expand descriptions for each cleaning service, including extras.

• Cleaning Checklists: Add detailed checklists for each cleaning service.

• FAQ Update: Review and update the FAQ section.

• Service Exclusion List: Include a clear list of services not offered.

• First-Time Booking Discount: Showcase a "Get 10% off your first clean" with a prominent "Book Now" button.

• Loyalty Program: Implement a system for tracking repeat customers and offering package deals for ongoing cleans.

• Direct Debit Payments: Set up direct debit as a payment option.

• Service Categories: Create separate tabs for House Clean, Apartment Clean, End of Lease Clean, Commercial Clean, and Office Clean with detailed descriptions.

• Gift Vouchers: Add a feature for purchasing cleaning gift cards.

• What's Included: Add a heading with a breakdown of what's covered in each service.

• 100% Guarantee Section: Clearly outline the satisfaction guarantee.

• Service Areas: Create SEO-friendly links for Sydney service areas.

• Australian-Owned Branding: Showcase "Australia Owned & Operated" along with the ABN.

• Legal Updates: Update the Privacy Policy and Website Terms & Conditions.

• Online Booking Discount: Offer 5% off for online bookings leading to a payment deposit screen.

• Emergency Clean SEO: Optimize for last-minute/emergency cleans to improve Google ranking.

• Booking Call-to-Action: Change "Get a Quote in 30 Seconds" to "Book in 30 Seconds" for a more direct approach.





Ezy Move

• Logo Fix: Adjust the logo on the quote page (currently blends into the background).

• Live Chat: Add a pop-up "Talk to a Human" message connected to a mobile number.

• Showcase Reviews: Display all reviews prominently on the homepage, including Trustpilot reviews.

• Cross-Promotion with Ezy Cleans: Advertise a 10% discount package for moving & cleaning services.

• Expanded Services: Add new service tabs, including Interstate/Country Moves, Office Moving, Commercial/Warehouse Moves, Packing Ladies, Decluttering, and Home Organizing.

• Quote Form Improvements:

• Integrate "Calcumate" into the website and quote form.

• Create a separate quote form for interstate/country moves based on distance calculations.

• Improve local move quote form with pricing estimates.

• Media Update: Replace images and video content to match the professional and high-quality branding of Ezy Move.

• FAQ Update: Review and update the FAQ section.

• Gift Vouchers: Add an option for purchasing moving gift cards.

• What's Included: Add a section detailing what's covered in each move.

• Service Areas: Create SEO-friendly links for Sydney service areas.

• Insurance Section: Display insurance documents and coverage details.

• Quick Quote Feature: Add an "In a Hurry?" quick suburb-to-suburb quote option.

• Call-to-Action for Calls: Include a "Don't want to fill out a form? Call us" section.

• Quote Form Time Slots: Add Morning (7-12), Afternoon (12-5), and After-Hours (5PM+) options.

• Duplicated Quote Forms: Create tailored quote forms for Local, Interstate, Office, and Warehouse moves with minor variations.

• Future Box Shop Integration: Prepare space to integrate an online box shop when ready.

• Australian-Owned Branding: Showcase "Australia Owned & Operated".

• Legal Updates: Update the Privacy Policy and Website Terms & Conditions.

• Added Benefits & Discounts:

• Highlight free shrink wrap and blankets.

• Include disassembly services as a dedicated section.

• Add a Gallery for past moves and completed jobs.

• Create a Helpful Content section with moving tips.

• Showcase student and pensioner discounts.

• Offer 5% off for moves from Monday-Wednesday.

• Emergency Removal SEO: Optimize for last-minute/emergency removals for better Google ranking.

• Online Booking Discount: Offer 5% off for online bookings leading to a payment deposit screen.

• SEO Enhancements:

• Highlight Interstate Moves by Route for better SEO and Google Ads.

• Add White Glove Removals as a premium moving option.

• Introduce a White Glove Exclusive Interstate Service & Backload/Shared Service.

• Rubbish Removal Services to be listed as an additional service.

• Class B Toll Charges: Include pricing links and breakdowns.


Let me know your thoughts, and if you need any clarification. Also, please provide an estimated timeline and cost breakdown for these updates.


Looking forward to your response.


Best Regards,

Adrian
